segments.text: My eyes keep going back to that two-step stool under the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It just doesn't look safe at all; the legs are splayed out at an odd angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really putting his weight on it, trying to reach inside for those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I have a terrible feeling it's going to tip over any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the noise of him falling, and possibly breaking that plate he's holding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating that the woman is so engrossed in her dish-drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely missing this obvious danger right behind her, it's infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor is already soaked from the overflowing sink, making it even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One slip and it could be a really nasty fall for any of them, a real hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to intervene before things get completely out of hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene makes my stomach churn with a genuine sense of impending doom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame such a happy moment for the kids could end so badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this carelessness just boils my blood, frankly, it's quite bothersome.
segments.speaker: PAR
